A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
I found the pace of the film to be offputting\, no luxurious shots or dialogues\, instead with all of the tertiary (read: unnecessary) characters supported with screen time\, the stuff that should have commanded the most screen time was instead clipped\, to its detriment.

As a viewer\, I felt that the 'ask' was too much\, the screenwriters answered no questions I had about the mysteries developed in The Force awakens and in general nothing was solved for me.

I won't view the film again and find myself skeptical of the new Star Wars vision\, under Disney.
